title: What to do if peer has not allowed access and the deadline is over for peer review in Project 2

posts.cooked_content: I had been accidentally given a duplicate peer and assigned a new peer on 10th April with the evaluation deadline being 11th April 11:59 PM. I had asked for access to the Google Sheet for question 1 however I have not been given any access and the deadline is up. What to do?
posts.cleaned_text: I had been accidentally given a duplicate peer and assigned a new peer on 10th April with the evaluation deadline being 11th April 11:59 PM. I had asked for access to the Google Sheet for question 1 however I have not been given any access and the deadline is up. What to do?

posts.cooked_content: Yes, same for me the links i got has not been accessed to me. I mailed regarding this. So i filled form for most of the peers. I was waiting for the response but didnt get any.
posts.cleaned_text: Yes, same for me the links i got has not been accessed to me. I mailed regarding this. So i filled form for most of the peers. I was waiting for the response but didnt get any.

posts.cooked_content:
@SohamHaldar @21f3000745 We had sent out an email with an extra non - duplicate peer and extended the deadline by a day to accommodate reviewing the extra peer. Please check your email with the subject.
[TDS Jan 25] Bonus peer
posts.cleaned_text: @SohamHaldar @21f3000745 We had sent out an email with an extra non - duplicate peer and extended the deadline by a day to accommodate reviewing the extra peer. Please check your email with the subject. [TDS Jan 25] Bonus peer

posts.cooked_content: Yes sir, but therein lies the problem, this extra peer (atleast for me) did not give me access to his Google Sheets and now the deadline is over and I could not submit a blank Google form.
posts.cleaned_text: Yes sir, but therein lies the problem, this extra peer (atleast for me) did not give me access to his Google Sheets and now the deadline is over and I could not submit a blank Google form.
